se¶

isopy.toolbox.np_func.se(a, axis=None)¶

Compute the standard error along the specified axis for N-1 degrees of freedom.

Parameters

  • a (array_like) – Input array or object that can be converted to an array.

  • axis (int or None, optional) – Axis along which the range is computed. Default is None. If None compute over the entire array.

Shortcut for scipy.stats.sem(a, ddof=1, axis=axis, dtype=dtype, nan_policy='propagate').

See documentation for scipy.stats.sem for additional information.

See also

nanse()
